description: Multi-period site, late prehistoric to post medieval. Evidence for Roman settlement and inhumations, a polygonal structure was present which has been interpreted as a shrine.
bibliography: Bennett, Riddler, and Sparey-Green. “The Roman Watermills and Settlement at Ickham, Kent.” The Archaeology of Canterbury New Series 5 (2010).
Martyn, Blick, Brindle, and et al. “Ickham (Kent).” The Rural Settlement of Roman Britain: an online resource, 2015. https://doi.org/10.5284/1030449.
